content.body: shu: re: https://github.com/tc39/ecma262/pull/2548, it looks like very nearly every `!`-prefixed call gets the user-code effect suppressed (possibly actually all of them?). maybe worth building that heuristic into ecmarkup?
content.formatted_body: shu: re: https://github.com/tc39/ecma262/pull/2548, it looks like very nearly every !-prefixed call gets the user-code effect suppressed (possibly actually all of them?). maybe worth building that heuristic into ecmarkup?
